title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Leadership Competency Enhancement Through Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience applying statistics in work environments
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic statistical methods (e.g., mean, standard deviation) for workplace data analysis with 80% accuracy.
Learners specify decision-making scenarios by utilizing mathematical modeling (e.g., simple equations) in problem-solving processes with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can visually represent and explain complex mathematical concepts using digital tools (mobile calculators, educational apps).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
